com.bizosys.hsearch.common
Interface Field

All Known Implementing Classes:
HField, SField
public interface Field

A field is a section of a Document Content. Each field has two parts, a name and a value. Values may be free text, provided as a String or as any Java data type or serializable atomic object implementing IStorable interface.

Method Summary
 ByteField getByteField()
          Get the name and value of the field
 boolean isAnalyze()
          Specifies whether a field should be analyzed for extracting words.
 boolean isIndexable()
          Specifies whether a field should be indexed.
 boolean isStore()
          Specifies whether a field should be stored.
